short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert jd.com prices into any currency according to the current international exchange rate.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension can help you access jd.com to convert CNY into the currency you set according to the current international exchange rate.
